Methods

create

(
  • game
)
private

Defined in src\myplugin.js:37

This create method is executed when Kiwi Game that has been told to use this plugin reaches the boot stage of the game loop.

Parameters:

  • game Kiwi.Game

    The game that is current in the boot stage.
